title: Question 30:
description: How can I see all of the Synths I own?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The easiest way is to connect your wallet to https://synthetix.exchange/#/assets/overview 

You will see all of your Synth balances [under](https://synthetix.exchange/#/assets/overview).

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
